result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mari Jo Jessen

defendant.name: Jessen, Mari Jo
defendant.address: 1408 South Aberdeen Avenue, Sioux Falls, SD 57106

records.addlTxt: Signed bond e-filed by Atty Zimmerman. Copy given to SCSO this date.  gll
from Clerk to Atty. Zimmerman regarding bond. ec: Attys. kma

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Colten B. The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

1:15 PM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: K. Anderson, Attorney Bela Alexander Ballo in court for State of Wisconsin, Attorney Nicholas M Zimmerman in court for Mari Jo Jessen. Defendant Mari Jo Jessen appeared by video. DE received copy of complaint. Waives reading. NG. Confirms address and DOB. Court sets STC, Zoom approved. Court sets bond, Atty. Zimmerman to have DE sign and return. Adjourned: 1:18 PM. kma
